extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the open beta program of our upcoming new racing shooter game, Fatal Derby.GAME NOTESIf you need help, please visit Fatal Derby Home Page at http://www.ectodox.com/fatalderby/ . If you are using PC or MAC, you can also try the game in web browser (3D video card required).OPEN BETAThe main reason of this beta is the diversity of android devices. We would like to release the full game as bug free as possible, but we have limited number of devices to test on. So, if you you are interested in a similar type of game, feel free to try it out. Keep in mind, this game is currently under development, so bugs, graphical glitches and stability issues may occur. We welcome all kinds of reports and constructive criticism. If you enjoy the game, please give us a high rating, thank you!If you decide to send us a bug report or request, please don't forget to mention the device type you are using.CURRENT BETA FEATURES AND LIMITATIONS- 3 cars are available with all upgrades- 3 maps are available- 3 weapons are available: machine guns, mines, rockets- Championship mode is enabled in limited mode (3 seasons, class 3 only)- Time trap mode is now enabled- All mission types are now enabled- FPS counter is visible- Save game compatibility (beta versions)In future versions, we may enable/disable several game functions for testing purposes.REQUIREMENTS:OS: Android 2.2 or higherCPU: 800Mhz or fasterGPU: Currently under reconsideration.Screen: at least 800x480 screen resolution is recommended, but not required.Multitouch support (at least 2 taps)The game should run fine on:-Samsung Galaxy S1, S2, S3, Tab, Fascinate-Sony Ericcson Xperia Play-Asus Transformer Series-LG Revolution, Optimus 2X-HTC Sensation, Thunderbolt, Inspire 4G, EVO3D-Motorola Droid 3, X2, AtrixIf you are unsure about your device, the game will run a basic compatibility test at first start. You may run the game even if your device fails at some tests, but we cannot guarantee an enjoyable gameplay.

reviews.title: Its B.E.T.A., but it\'s still fun
reviews.comment: I like the \"slower\", more manageable gameplay compared to that other popular car fighting game..... which is all graphics, short races, etc. But this definitely needs a Champion circuit...to move up
